title: Retrieve Periodic Update Period
description: Get a single self-employment periodic update for a given identifier.

turnover.description: The takings, fees, sales or money earned by your business.

amount.description: Income associated with the running of the business. The value must be between 0 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

other.description: Any other business income not included in turnover.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint.

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource.

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint.
